hints.dialogue: Dialogue: 'I wish the pain would abate,' she said.
hints.story: Story: In Friends, Ross was hoping his bad luck would abate after a string of misfortunes.

hints.context: Context: A benevolent smile lit up her face.

hints.story: Story: In GOT, Jon Snow's benevolent acts made him popular among the people.

hints.context: Context: An astute observer quickly picked up on the subtle differences.
